RSS_requires_FGHI_URL: Some FGHI URL should be given after «/rss?».
RSS_requires_area_URL: RSS is provided only for the «area://» URLs.
RSS_requires_single_area_URL: RSS output for «area://» URLs with multiple echomail area names is not currently supported.
RSS_requires_some_area_URL: RSS output for «area://» URLs without an echomail area name cannot be generated.
RSS_area_not_found: Unfortunately, the echomail area «%s» is not found on the system. Cannot create RSS for this area.
RSS_area_passthrough: Unfortunately, the echomail area «%s» is passthrough. Cannot create RSS for this area.
RSS_area_config_reading_error: Unfortunately, an unknown error occured while reading the configuration of the echomail area «%s». Cannot create RSS for this area.
RSS_error_generating: Unfortunately, there was an error when generating an RSS feed for the echomail area «%s».
areafile_requires_single_area_URL: Decoding a file designated by an «area://» URL with multiple echomail area names is not currently supported.
areafile_requires_simple_path: Decoding a file designated by an «area://» URL with a complex path to that file is not currently supported.
areafile_area_not_found: Unfortunately, the echomail area «%s» is not found on the system. Cannot get a file from this area.
areafile_area_passthrough: Unfortunately, the echomail area «%s» is passthrough. Cannot get a file from this area.
areafile_area_config_reading_error: Unfortunately, an unknown error occured while reading the configuration of the echomail area «%s». Cannot get a file from this area.
areafile_not_found: Unfortunately, the file «%s» could not be found in the echomail area «%s».
mail_base_locked: WebBBS service is temporarily unavailable (an update of mail bases is in progress). Try again later.
stub: You have successfully reached the initial version of the WebBBS application.
stub_echolist: You have successfully reached the initial version of the echolist viewer.
